import React from 'react' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Row, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' export default function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const logoutHandler = () =>{ console.log('logout') } return ( Nexus Robotech
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ):( Login )}
) }
